turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to go to the Starbucks on Sunset.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure what would you like to order from starbucks?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: a regular small coffee. And then I need a fruit sample, so whatever fruit they have.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want that coffee iced or hot?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and did you want any milk in that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, awesome. anything else for you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so to confirm, you'd like a small iced coffee with 2% milk and a fruit plate Starbucks on Sunset.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The total will be $6.40. Would you like to place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your drink and food will be ready in 5 minutes.
